title: Here's To The Friends We'll Never Forget Because They Have Changed Our Lives Forever
text:
This one's for the friends who have been there for all along, friends who, very beautifully, continue to prove to us everyday that they will be there for us for the time to come. We owe our entire life to these friends.

They have changed our lives for the good just by their sheer presence and that is why we'll never forget them. Even if one day they decide to leave us. After all, they have given us so much to remember.

Pexels

In times when we as a generation have forgotten how to love, times when nobody really gives a damn about the other person, a life where everyone is temporary, it is these friends who have stood the test of time and been there for us unconditionally.

They adore us when we are rich or poor, whether we fail or succeed. Or at times when our life is spiraling down, these friends make us feel like we belong. It's these friends we can go to when everyone else has given up on us, and they will make us feel loved all over again.

This is for those friends who we'll never forget for their unwavering loyalty.

Pexels

Don't Miss 1.4 K SHARES 153 SHARES 911 SHARES

Mind you, these friends could have easily walked out from our life. Considering we give way less than how much they give us. But these god sent angels stuck around in our worst times. They gave us courage to fight. Courage to survive. It could be in the form of a text that reads, "Don't be sad, it won't last forever" and just these seven words will fill us with hope, something no one else can do.

And somehow these friends always manage to make time for us. Squeeze us into their busy schedules. And that's how they make us feel like a priority.

Also, it doesn't just end with them providing a shoulder for us to cry on. They are also the friends who we have a bloody good time with. The kind of friends with whom everything feels like an adventure and how a simple lunch can also feel exciting. It's their ability to make everyday full of smiles and fun that makes them impossible to forget.

Unsplash

All we want to say to such friends is a big thank you for being so selfless. For giving us a forever, in a world where nothing is permanent.

Thank you for your friendship. It's a real honour. And that's also why we will never forget them.
